TopicTitle: Mk1 Liquid Fuel Fusalage missing in 1.8

Articles.Content:
I updated to 1.8 and when im loading my space craft I get and error saying its missing a part, the MK1 Liquid Fuel Fusalage. I made a new save game in Sandbox mode and see if it was my old save/craft that got botched but its also now in sandbox mode. I removed KSP en reinstalled via Steam and still no MK1 Liquid Fuel Fusalage to be seen in Sandbox, imported my saves and carft, still nothing.

Anyone else experiencing this? First i thought it was mod related but even a clean install without mods its missing. Other MK1 parts are available and can be used, but not the fusalage piece.

Edited October 17, 2019 by AlphaRP
Extra info

The Mk 1 Liquid Fuel Fuselage shows up for me, and the craft I built with it function properly.

I'm in career mode on a Mac

21 hours ago, AlphaRP said:

I updated to 1.8 and when im loading my space craft I get and error saying its missing a part, the MK1 Liquid Fuel Fusalage. I made a new save game in Sandbox mode and see if it was my old save/craft that got botched but its also now in sandbox mode. I removed KSP en reinstalled via Steam and still no MK1 Liquid Fuel Fusalage to be seen in Sandbox, imported my saves and carft, still nothing.

Anyone else experiencing this? First i thought it was mod related but even a clean install without mods its missing. Other MK1 parts are available and can be used, but not the fusalage piece.

Do you have steam cloud enabled?Sometimes it messes up things.

21 hours ago, Boyster said:

Do you have steam cloud enabled?Sometimes it messes up things.

Dont know, I do installed via steam. Will check.

Well, I disabled cloud in Steam settings and reinstalled the game for the 4th time. There back!! However I dont know if it was the cloud that did the trick or the reinstall, nut worth trying for anyone running into the same.
